faqs.question: How long does the battery last?
faqs.answer: The SafeLoop band is designed to last up to 7 days on a single charge with normal usage. Power saving modes can extend this to 10 days.

faqs.question: Is the band waterproof?
faqs.answer: Yes, SafeLoop is IP68 rated, meaning it can withstand swimming, rain, and everyday splashes.

faqs.question: Does it require a SIM card?
faqs.answer: SafeLoop comes with a built-in eSIM that connects to major networks automatically. No separate SIM card is needed.

faqs.question: Can I listen to the surroundings?
faqs.answer: In emergency SOS mode, the parent can initiate a one-way listen-in feature to assess the situation.

faqs.question: What is the range of the tracking?
faqs.answer: SafeLoop uses GPS, WiFi, and Cellular triangulation, so it works anywhere there is cell service, globally.

faqs.question: How do I get alerts?
faqs.answer: You receive instant push notifications on the SafeLoop Parent App (iOS and Android) for SOS, geofence breaches, and low battery.
